data.message: someone I have never heard of posted a vulgar video to my timeline. I don't know her name or have ever seen her before. Is there anyway I can get it off my timeline?

replies.message: Hi Robert. To remove a story from your Timeline, please follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2cs1Uq4. You can also prevent this person from posting on your Timeline again by blocking them. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2cs3U1w. -Jessica
Facebook The hide / delete feature is no longer there!

Hey Robert, you can delete it ya... But in your settings there is a way to have it to where you have to approve what someone tags you in!! I have it set like that on mine for that SAME REASON! I'm not sure the exact category that it is under.. BUUT if you want to PM me then I can walk you thru it, as I myself have done it before!!
